remarks: Restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1998.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2016.)
statement:
rspc.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
rspc.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rspce $p |- ( ( A e. B /\ ps ) -> E. x e. B ph ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
